00015         abstract class AbstractComment extends ActiveRecord implements Dateable, Approvable
00016         {
00017                 protected function init($values)
00018                 {
00019                         if (isset($values['URL']) &&
00020                                 !empty($values['URL']) &&
00021                                 strpos($values['URL'], 'http://') !== 0)
00022                         {
00023                                 $this->URL = 'http://' . $values['URL'];
00024                         }
00025                 }

00031                 public function relative_url()
00032                 {
00033                         return "#comment-{$this->id}";
00034                 }

00040                 public function comment_class()
00041                 {
00042                         static $row = 0;
00043                         if (!$this->approved)
00044                         {
00045                                 return "comment-pending";
00046                         }
00047                         $row = 1 - $row;
00048                         return $row ? "comment-even" : "comment-odd";
00049                 }

00057                 {
00058                         return Markdown($this->text);
00059                 }

00066                 {
00067                         return strftime("%A %e %B %Y %H:%M:%S", strtotime($this->created_at));
00068                 }
00069

00075                 {
00076                         return date('r', strtotime($this->created_at));
00077                 }
00078                 
00083                 public function iso8601_date()
00084                 {

00086                 }
00087                 
00092                 public static function sort_comments($a, $b)
00093                 {
00094                         return (strtotime($a->created_at) < strtotime($b->created_at)) ? -1 : 1;
00095                 }
00096                 
00101                 public function approve()
00102                 {
00103                         $this->approved = 1;
00104                 }
00105 
00110                 public function reject()
00111                 {
00112                         $this->approved = 0;
00113                 }
00114                 
00119                 public function find_unapproved()
00120                 {
00121                         return $this->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`approved` = '0'"));
00122                 }
00123                 
00128                 public function find_approved()
00129                 {
00130                         return $this->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`approved` = '1'"));
